'''Teyvat Charred Egg''' is a [[Special Dish|special]] [[food]] item that the player has a chance to obtain by cooking [[Teyvat Fried Egg]] with [[Bennett]]. The [[recipe]] for Teyvat Fried Egg is available from the start of the game.

Teyvat Charred Egg revives a character and restores '''10'''% of Max HP, then restores an additional '''150''' HP to the target fallen character with a 120-second cooldown. Like most foods, this cannot target other players' characters in [[Co-Op Mode]].

==Trivia==
* To celebrate Bennett's birthday, the [[Teyvat Food Notes]] published a [https://ys.mihoyo.com/main/news/detail/14367 real-life recipe] for Teyvat Charred Egg and [[Adventurer's Breakfast Sandwich]].
* The following birthday mails included Teyvat Charred Egg:
** [[Mail/This is for You! (2021-02-28)|Bennett's 2021 Birthday Mail]] (1 Teyvat Charred Egg)
** [[Mail/Want to Eat Cake Together? (2022-02-28)|Bennett's 2022 Birthday Mail]] (1 Teyvat Charred Egg)
* According to [[Bennett/Media#Birthdays|Bennett's Birthday 2022 Artwork]], it is hinted that the method of cooking involves the original Teyvat Fried Egg being hit by a bolt of lightning.
